languages.text: {n}Нахмурившись, Кибелла добавляет:{/n} "Человек-без-сердца был подобен другому. Ксеносу из Темного города, что повелевал плотью и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}нечестивыми воскрешениями{/d}. Их тронула одна порча надменности".

traits.locale_text: {n}Нахмурившись, Кибелла добавляет:{/n} "Человек-без-сердца был подобен другому. Ксеносу из Темного города, что повелевал плотью и нечестивыми воскрешениями. Их тронула одна порча надменности".

languages.text: {n}Frowning, Kibellah adds,{/n} "There was another like the Heartless Man. A xenos from the Dark City who lorded over flesh and oversaw {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}unholy resurrections{/d}. They were both touched by the same corruption, that of hubris."
languages.original_text: {n}Нахмурившись, Кибелла добавляет:{/n} "Человек-без-сердца был подобен другому. Ксеносу из Темного города, что повелевал плотью и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}нечестивыми воскрешениями{/d}. Их тронула одна порча надменности".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah adds, frowning,{/n} "There was another like the Heartless One. A xenos from the Dark City who lorded over flesh and oversaw unholy resurrections. They were both touched by the same corruption, one of hubris."

{n}Kibellah adds, frowning,{/n} "There was another like the Heartless One. A xenos from the Dark City who lorded over flesh and oversaw unholy resurrections. They were both touched by the same corruption, one of hubris."

{n}Frowning, Kibellah adds,{/n} "There was another like the Heartless One. A xenos from the Dark City who lorded over flesh and oversaw unholy resurrections. They were both touched by the same corruption, that of hubris."

{n}Frowning, Kibellah adds,{/n} "There was another like the Heartless One. A xenos from the Dark City who lorded over flesh and oversaw unholy resurrections. They were both touched by the same corruption, that of hubris."

{n}Frowning, Kibellah adds,{/n} "There was another like the Heartless Man. A xenos from the Dark City who lorded over flesh and oversaw {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}unholy resurrections{/d}. They were both touched by the same corruption, that of hubris."

{n}Frowning, Kibellah adds,{/n} "There was another like the Heartless Man. A xenos from the Dark City who lorded over flesh and oversaw {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}unholy resurrections{/d}. They were both touched by the same corruption, that of hubris."

languages.text: {n}Les sourcils froncés, Kibellah ajoute :{/n} « Il y en avait un autre comme le Sans-Cœur. Un xénos de la Cité Crépusculaire qui avait un attrait certain pour la chair et procédait à des {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}résurrections impies{/d}. Tous deux semblent avoir été touchés par la même corruption : l'orgueil. »
languages.original_text: {n}Frowning, Kibellah adds,{/n} "There was another like the Heartless Man. A xenos from the Dark City who lorded over flesh and oversaw {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}unholy resurrections{/d}. They were both touched by the same corruption, that of hubris."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les sourcils froncés, Kibellah ajoute :{/n} « Il y en avait un autre comme le Sans-Cœur. Un xénos de la Cité Crépusculaire qui avait un attrait certain pour la chair et procédait à des {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}résurrections impies{/d}. Tous deux semblent avoir été touchés par la même corruption : l'orgueil. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah frunce el ceño y añade:{/n} «Hubo otro como el despiadado. Un xenos en la Ciudad Siniestra que gobernaba la carne y supervisaba {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}resurrecciones blasfemas{/d}. Ambos estaban tocados por la misma corrupción de la arrogancia».
languages.original_text: {n}Frowning, Kibellah adds,{/n} "There was another like the Heartless Man. A xenos from the Dark City who lorded over flesh and oversaw {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}unholy resurrections{/d}. They were both touched by the same corruption, that of hubris."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah frunce el ceño y añade:{/n} «Hubo otro como el despiadado. Un xenos en la Ciudad Siniestra que gobernaba la carne y supervisaba {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}resurrecciones blasfemas{/d}. Ambos estaban tocados por la misma corrupción de la arrogancia».

languages.text: {n}キベラは顔をしかめて付け加える。{/n}「無情なる男に似た奴が他にもいたわ。仄暗き都出身の異種族で、肉体を支配して{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}不浄の復活{/d}を取り仕切っていたの。どちらも同じ堕落に触れていた。傲慢という堕落ね」
languages.original_text: {n}Frowning, Kibellah adds,{/n} "There was another like the Heartless Man. A xenos from the Dark City who lorded over flesh and oversaw {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}unholy resurrections{/d}. They were both touched by the same corruption, that of hubris."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは顔をしかめて付け加える。{/n}「無情なる男に似た奴が他にもいたわ。仄暗き都出身の異種族で、肉体を支配して{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}不浄の復活{/d}を取り仕切っていたの。どちらも同じ堕落に触れていた。傲慢という堕落ね」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈皱着眉头，补充了一句。{/n}“我之前遇到过另一个人，与无心者非常相似。那个人是黑暗之城的异形，负责管理所有的血肉，主持{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}邪恶的复活仪式{/d}。这两个人都被同样的腐化浸染，犯下了傲慢的大罪。”
languages.original_text: {n}Frowning, Kibellah adds,{/n} "There was another like the Heartless Man. A xenos from the Dark City who lorded over flesh and oversaw {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}unholy resurrections{/d}. They were both touched by the same corruption, that of hubris."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈皱着眉头，补充了一句。{/n}“我之前遇到过另一个人，与无心者非常相似。那个人是黑暗之城的异形，负责管理所有的血肉，主持{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}邪恶的复活仪式{/d}。这两个人都被同样的腐化浸染，犯下了傲慢的大罪。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah runzelt die Stirn und ergänzt:{/n} "Es gab noch einen wie den Herzlosen. Ein Xenos aus der Dunklen Stadt, der über das Fleisch herrschte und {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}unheilige Wiederbelebungen{/d} beaufsichtigte. Beide waren der gleichen Korruption erlegen, dem Hochmut."
languages.original_text: {n}Frowning, Kibellah adds,{/n} "There was another like the Heartless Man. A xenos from the Dark City who lorded over flesh and oversaw {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}unholy resurrections{/d}. They were both touched by the same corruption, that of hubris."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah runzelt die Stirn und ergänzt:{/n} "Es gab noch einen wie den Herzlosen. Ein Xenos aus der Dunklen Stadt, der über das Fleisch herrschte und {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}unheilige Wiederbelebungen{/d} beaufsichtigte. Beide waren der gleichen Korruption erlegen, dem Hochmut."

languages.text: {n}Kaşlarını çatan Kibellah, sözlerine devam ediyor.{/n} "Kalpsiz Adam'a benzer birisi daha vardı. Kara Şehir'de yaşayan bir zeno, kendini etten üstün görerek {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}kâfirce dirilişlere{/d} önderlik etmişti. Her ikisi de aynı yozlaşmanın, aynı kibrin kölesiydi."
languages.original_text: {n}Frowning, Kibellah adds,{/n} "There was another like the Heartless Man. A xenos from the Dark City who lorded over flesh and oversaw {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_KibellahWasInCommoragh}unholy resurrections{/d}. They were both touched by the same corruption, that of hubris."
